title: Flamme Olympique FC
text:
Flamme Olympique Football Club de Guinee is a <a href="Guinea">Guinea</a>n <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Conakry">Conakry</a>. They play in the <a href="Guinean%20Second%20Division">Guinean Second Division</a>, which is the second league in Guinean football. They play their home games at 25,000 capacity <a href="Stade%20du%2028%20Septembre">Stade du 28 Septembre</a>. Its uniform colors are white and blue.
History.
The club was founded in 2009. They played in the 2015-2016 <a href="Guin%C3%A9e%20Championnat%20National">Guinée Championnat National</a> season ending at the 12th place.
